summary:
Power Rangers is a popular kids' franchise with a TV show and toys. It started in 1993 and is based on a Japanese series called Super Sentai. The story follows a group of teens who turn into superheroes to fight bad guys.

The show has had many seasons and movies, and it's known for its action figures and toys. Hasbro now owns the franchise and makes new toys. The show has been a big hit and has made a lot of money, even though some people didn't like the violent scenes when it first came out.
title: Power Rangers
